name: Chill Drill
description:
Controls:

Move: WASD or Arrow Keys
Jump: Spacebar or K
Drill: J
Restart Game: Escape

Gamepad is supported too

You are the Penguin Kevin, and you have to get to drill youself to the bottom of the earth. Be careful of polar bears though.

The game was made in 48 hours for the UOL Game Jam #5 by Vault Kid, Saboras and Kim.
